participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

fit_ss_protocol_startdate.Description: First day of (expected) wear of 3 week protocol

fit_ss_day_wkno.Description: Week number starting from first day of protocol wear

fit_ss_wk_avg_day_min.Description: Average number of minutes of wear not excluded or considered sleep (by 60 second sleep record) | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_avg_sleep_min.Description: Average number of minutes of wear considered sleep (by 60 second sleep record) not excluded due to HR quality checks | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_total_steps.Description: Sum of steps during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_sedentary_min.Description: Sum of minutes spent in sedentary (<1.5 METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_light_active_min.Description: Sum of minutes spent in light (1.5-2.9METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_farily_active_min.Description: Sum of minutes spent in moderate (3-5.9 METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_very_active_min.Description: Sum of of minutes spent in vigorous (6+ METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_avg_steps.Description: Average number of daily steps during day_min during included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_average_met_value.Description: Average METS/min during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_avg_sedentary_min.Description: Average minutes spent in sedentary (<1.5 METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_avg_light_active_min.Description: Average minutes spent in light (1.5-2.9METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_avg_farily_at_min.Description: Average minutes spent in moderate (3-5.9 METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_wk_avg_very_active_min.Description: Average minutes spent in vigorous (>6 METS) activity during day_min on included days | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_fitbit_rest_hr.Description: Average resting heart rate from all included days from the daily level fitbit record | Low(er) resting heart rate is usually indicative of a) stronger cardiac muscle/better cardiorespiratory fitness and b) improved (para)sympathetic nervous tone

fit_ss_weekend_count.Description: Number of weekend days included in averages | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_weekday_count.Description: Number of weekdays included in averages | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_meet_abcd_rule.Description: 0=no, 1=yes.  ABCD inclusion rule is minimum of 4 days, 1 of which must be a weekend day | Individual day only included if day minutes >599

fit_ss_perday_totalsteps.Description: Number of steps per day according to fitbit daily level summary | Individual day only included if day minutes >599 based upon ABCD QC record

fit_ss_perday_sedentarymin.Description: Average minutes spent in sedentary (<1.5 METS) activity during day_min on included days based upon daily level fitbit record | Individual day only included if day minutes >599 based upon ABCD QC record

fit_ss_perday_lightlyactivemin.Description: Average minutes spent in light (1.5-2.9METS) activity during day_min on included days based upon daily level fitbit record | Individual day only included if day minutes >599 based upon ABCD QC record

fit_ss_perday_fairlyactivemin.Description: Average minutes spent in moderate (3-5.9 METS) activity during day_min on included days based upon daily level fitbit record | Individual day only included if day minutes >599 based upon ABCD QC record

fit_ss_perday_veryactivemin.Description: Average minutes spent in vigorous (6+ METS) activity during day_min on included days based upon daily level fitbit record | Individual day only included if day minutes >599 based upon ABCD QC record
